titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Queens County Courthouse subpoena record 1977.448
titlestmt.author: Matthew Gorham
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was originally processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-11-29 18:30:29 +0000.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.abstract: A subpoena record requesting the presence of the person listed to act as a witness in a case held at the Queens County Courthouse in Jamaica, Queens.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Source and date of acquisition unknown. The item was formally accessioned in 1977.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection consists of a single document.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Queens County Courthouse subpoena record, 1977.448, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Public Library, Center for Brooklyn History.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was rehoused and the finding aid revised by Dee Bowers in 2023.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: A subpoena record requesting the presence of the person listed (the name is largely illegible) to act as a witness in a case held at the Queens County Courthouse in Jamaica, Queens. The creator of this document is unknown.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This item is in the public domain. While many items at the Center for Brooklyn History are unrestricted, we do not own reproduction rights to all materials. Be aware of the several kinds of rights that might apply: copyright, licensing and trademarks. The researcher assumes all responsibility for copyright questions.

controlaccess.genreform: Court records -- New York (State) -- Queens County
